'''Agnidus Agates''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Character#Ascensions|ascension]] of {{Pyro}} [[character]]s.

==Types==
{{Material Quality
|2=Agnidus Agate Sliver
|3=Agnidus Agate Fragment
|4=Agnidus Agate Chunk
|5=Agnidus Agate Gemstone
}}

==Full Description==
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."<br>
"Burnt to cinders for a dream."<br>
"If the intention yet remains, achieved {{Obf|--}}'s truth he has."

==Trivia==
* <section begin="AgnidusQuote" />The lines in the item description{{If Self|Agnidus Agate|s|}} are referenced in the lyrics of the soundtrack [[Anthem of the Savannah]].<section end="AgnidusQuote" />

===Etymology===
* The English name for this item derives "Agnidus" from {{w|Agni}}, the Vedic deity of fire and the guardian of the southwest.
* In the Chinese version, "Agnidus" is instead {{zh|s=燃愿|t=燃願|rm=Rányuàn|tl=Burning Wish; Raising [One's] Hope.}}
